main_page.main_page_notification_message_no_messag: Uzakira ubutumwa buvuye kukigo mwatanzeho ibitekerezo/ ikibazo cyangwa ikifuzo
main_page.main_page_notification_message_inform_ch: Urihuza kutumenyesha uko ikibazo watugejejeho cyasojwe, hitamo kimwe mu byo twashyize munsi
Ikibazo ntago cyakemuwe, ariko nishimiye ibisobanuro nahawe.
Ikibazo ntago cyakemutse, ariko ntanubwo nishimiye ibisobanuro nahawe.
Ikibazo cyasuzumwe n'abakozi ba RGB bashinzwe agasanduku k'ibitekerezo
Ikibazo cyoherejwe mu biro by'Umuvunyi mukuru kugirangi cyigweho
main_page.main_page_forum_your_su_community: Sangiza igitekerezo cyawe kuri iri huriro
main_page.main_page_forum_suggestion_panel: Ubu ni uburyo mwashyiriweho ngo mubaze ibibazo bijyanye na:
main_page.main_page_forum_suggestion_panel_thank_y: Murakoze gukoresha runo rubuga, igitekerezo cyanyu ni inyamibwa kuri twe
main_page.main_page_forum_suggestion_panel_send_br: Tanga icyifuzo/ igitekerezo kukigo ushaka ukoresheje ibi bikurikira:
